pullRequest.title: Preferences DSL
pullRequest.bodyText:
Preferences are now 100% typesafe and easy to configure.
Changes

Added a DSL to the preferences UI
Changed how reading/writing preferences works (based on my gist)

Now adds extra metadata to preferences


Fixed seekbar margins
Removed longPreference UI (switched the preference using it to seekbar)
Fixed some bugs:

TimeUtils.formatSeconds returned the string "Seconds" without the amount of seconds


Removed preferences XML file 🎉

Todo

Remove the XML file
Fix dependencies (currently not working)
Fix summary for audio delay preference
Fix inputType for longPreference
Fix reset button for shortcuts

Issues

commit.message: Add custom DSL for preference screen and replace the XML preferences with it
Add function to bind preferences to the preferences UI
